long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SUIVI: The Ultimate Influencer Analytics Tool for Instagram, TikTok & X

Unlock AI-powered insights and grow your social media impact with SUIVI, the premier social media analytics tool designed specifically for businesses, influencers and brands on Instagram, TikTok, and X (formerly Twitter).

What's New in SUIVI:
üìñ Instagram Story Archive & Analytics
Unlock the power of Instagram Stories! SUIVI automatically saves stories from influencers in your watchlist, giving you exclusive access to a comprehensive story archive. Dive into detailed analytics to understand story performance and trends like never before.

üîç Similar Profile Recommendations
SUIVI's AI takes it further by recommending similar Instagram profiles to those you're tracking. Discover new influencers that align with your strategy effortlessly.

‚ú® SUIVI AI for Influencer Strategy
With advanced AI, SUIVI dives deep into profile statistics, revealing insights into engagement, follower growth, and reach. Generate tailored influencer partnership strategies based on unique profile strengths.

üìä Business Categories for Influencers
Now view the business category of each Instagram influencer in the overview, network, and watchlist for better targeting.

üî• Viral Post Tracking
Easily access viral posts from influencers in your watchlist directly on the SUIVI dashboard.

SUIVI Helps You With:
Real-Time Social Media Insights: Stay updated with data from the latest 12 posts, helping you track trends and follower engagement.
Comprehensive Engagement Metrics: Explore likes, comments, and more to gauge performance.
Hashtag and Influencer Analytics: Discover top-performing hashtags, mentioned influencers, and locations tagged for a strategic advantage.
Influencer Watchlist: Save important profiles for quick monitoring and tracking.
PDF Reporting: Download reports of your tracked profiles, making it easy to share insights.
Regional Influencer Recommendations: Use SUIVI AI to find the best influencer partnerships in your area.
Plus: New tools like coin-earning missions, alarm settings, and a web app let you supercharge your social media strategy.

Ready to grow your influence? Install SUIVI today for the ultimate insights on Instagram, X (formerly Twitter), and TikTok. We're always evolving, so share your feedback with us anytime!
